description: A format for spreadsheet documents in the Open Office XML (ISO 29500) format family, developed originally by Microsoft and used as the default format used by Microsoft Excel 2007 and later versions.  Specified in parts 1 and 4 of ISO/IEC 29500, Information technology -- Document description and processing languages -- Office Open XML File Formats (OOXML).
name: XLSX, (Office Open XML, Spreadsheet ML) ISO 29500:2008-2012, also ECMA-376, Editions 1-4.

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
